name: tm11
effect: Teaches Sunny Day to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Sunny Day to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen I: BubbleBeam)

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
Raises the power of
FIRE-type moves
for 5 turns.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
Raises the power of
FIRE-type moves
for 5 turns.

five turns, powering
up FIRE-type
moves.

flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
The user intensifies the sun for five turns, powering
up Fire-type moves. This also weakens the power
of Water-type moves.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
The user intensifies the sun for five turns, powering
up Fire-type moves. This also weakens the power
of Water-type moves.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
The user shoots a sinister flame at the target to inflict
a burn.
flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
In this two-turn attack, the user gathers light, then
blasts a bundled beam on the next turn.
